communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Please conduct a search for responsive records and hereby request the following:

Any and all records mentioning, relating to, or generated as a result of investigation into  Vincent SICURELLA (AKA: Jim, AKA: Jimmy)

Vincent SICURELLA's Date  of death was  December 7, 2009. Here is a link to his obituary in the Buffalo News: https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/buffalonews/name/vincent-sicurella-obituary?id=4727802



SICURELLA is listed in the FBI's  2006 Buffalo LCN Chart.  I have attached a PDF of this chart. 

Please include any and all surveillance pictures and charts containing  and/or referring to Vincent "Jimmy" SICURELLA.  

In addition to conducting this search for records at the FBI Field Office in Buffalo, NY, please conduct an additional search of the Central Records System, including but not limited to the Electronic Surveillance (ELSUR) Indices, the Microphone Surveillance (MISUR) Indices, the Physical Surveillance (FISUR) Indices, and the Technical Surveillance (TESUR) Indices, for both main-file records and cross-reference records for all relevant names, individuals, agencies and companies at FBI Headquarters. Please also conduct a search for records at the Alexandria Records Center. 

If any potentially responsive records have been destroyed and/or transferred to NARA, then I request copies of the destruction or transfer slips as well as any other documentation relating to, mentioning or describing said transfer or destruction, to include but not be limited to confirmation that the Bureau has no other copies of said records. 

If previously released records are available, then I request a rolling release consisting of those records while additional records are located and processed for release.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Mob

title: Community Assistance and Liaison (CALL) Employee Roster

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

A complete and current roster of all former and current employees of the Community Assistance and Liaison (CALL first responders and admin), including for each employee:

Full name
Age
Gender
Race
Job title
Department or division
Work email address (if available)
Date of hire (if available and non-exempt)
Date of termination (if relevant)

If any of the above fields are exempt from disclosure, please redact only the exempt information and release the remainder of the records in accordance with the partial disclosure provisions of applicable public records law. I am not requesting any personally identifiable information that is protected by law, such as Social Security numbers or personal contact information.

I would prefer to receive this information in electronic format (e.g., CSV, Excel, or PDF) if available.

If there are any fees for searching or copying the records, please inform me before processing the request. I also request a waiver of fees as the information is being sought for research and public interest purposes, not for commercial use.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Filed Requests
